query: "What was my Erythrocyte count on July 7, 2020, and is it within the normal range?"
resource_summaries: This is an observation record for the measurement of Erythrocytes in Blood by Automated count, taken on July 7, 2020, with a value of 3.9809 x 10^6 cells per microliter.
answer: Your Erythrocyte count on July 7, 2020, was 3.9809 x 10^6 cells per microliter. To determine if this count is within the normal range, you should consult with your healthcare provider as normal ranges can vary depending on the laboratory and individual factors.
